news.title: Apartments in Mangaluru convert wet waste into compost, generate income
news.para: Apartment complexes in Mangaluru are embracing sustainable waste management by converting wet waste into organic compost using advanced machines and traditional vermicomposting. This initiative reduces landfill waste, generates revenue for resident associations, and offers benefits like reduced odour and pest issues, with some complexes even receiving tax discounts.

news.title: Building owners in Wayanad left out of rehabilitation efforts
news.para: Building owners in Wayanad's Chooralmala and Mundakkai are still awaiting government compensation 1.5 years after a devastating landslide destroyed their properties. Despite facing financial distress and receiving property tax notices for destroyed buildings, they remain excluded from rehabilitation efforts, impacting their livelihoods and loan repayments.

news.title: Anchor Group feud nears resolution as Mehul Shah emerges top bidder for GreatWhite
news.para: A family dispute over control of GreatWhite Global is nearing resolution as Mehul Shah emerges as the successful bidder to acquire his brother Hemang Shah's 50% stake. The National Company Law Tribunal has directed both parties to expedite the conclusion of the bidding process, with a hearing scheduled for March 6.

news.title: Easy Home Finance secures $30 million from Investcorp, Claypond Capital, SMBC Asia
news.para: Speaking with ET, founder Rohit Chokhani said the funds will primarily be used to grow the loan book and expand its network in smaller towns. Founded in 2017, Easy Home Finance operates an app-based lending platform which has automated applications, underwriting, and loan management.

news.title: Lucknow development body floats 27-storey luxury housing project in Aishbagh
news.para: Lucknow Development Authority has approved Aishbagh Square, a 27-storey luxury residential complex featuring 384 flats. The project, located near Charbagh railway station, will offer 3-BHK apartments starting at Rs 1.11 crore. Registration opens January 29, with allotment via lottery and possession expected within five years.

news.title: Uttar Pradesh housing department forms panel for second phase of ease of rules drive
news.para: The UP housing department has formed a six-member committee to implement the second phase of compliance reduction and deregulation. This move follows the success of the first phase. The committee will identify bottlenecks in application processing for individuals and private players. The goal is to improve the working ecosystem for all stakeholders and streamline turnaround times for approvals and clearances.

news.title: Surat-based diamond and real estate group faces I-T department search
news.para: The Income Tax Department has launched a major search operation targeting a prominent Surat-based diamond manufacturer and real estate developer. Searches are underway at multiple locations across India, including Surat, Mumbai, Bengaluru, and New Delhi. The investigation focuses on undisclosed earnings from their real estate ventures. The group also has significant interests in education and global diamond businesses.

news.title: No new affordable housing projects in two years, Gurugram & Faridabad buyers priced out
news.para: Affordable housing in Gurgaon and Faridabad is becoming a distant dream for middle-class families as new project launches have stalled. Rising land and construction costs have made it difficult for developers to build within the government's price cap, leading to a near-freeze in approvals and leaving many aspiring homeowners locked out of the market.

news.title: In some states of USA, a push to end all property taxes for homeowners
news.para: Multiple states across the US, including Georgia, Florida, and Texas, are taking bold steps to potentially abolish property taxes for homeowners. The proposal in Georgia aims for a full phase-out by 2032, while Florida and Texas are closely examining similar initiatives.

news.title: Aditya Birla Real Estate posts ₹75 crore loss in Q3 FY26
news.para: Aditya Birla Real Estate reported a net loss of Rs 75.31 crore in Q3 FY26, alongside a steep decline in total income which plummeted to Rs 90.33 crore. Keyur Shah is set to assume the role of Chief Financial Officer on March 1, 2026, stepping in after Snehal Shah's retirement.

news.title: Andhra Pradesh cabinet approves ₹4,451 crore loan guarantee for PMAY
news.para: The Andhra Pradesh government has greenlit Rs 4,451 crore loan guarantee aimed at enhancing housing development. A partnership between the public and private sectors will see the upgrade of a government medical college.

news.title: Lodha Developers' profit rises marginally to ₹957 crore in Q3 FY26
news.para: Lodha Developers announced a 1 percent rise in its net profit for the third quarter of this fiscal year. The company's total income also saw an increase.  The company has entered the Delhi-NCR market, serving the top four housing markets in India.

news.title: Suraj Estate Developers' net profit up 25.93% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Suraj Estate Developers' net profit saw an increase of 25.93 percent for the quarter ending December 31, 2025. Total income also rose by 5.62 percent. Sales area and value experienced substantial year-on-year growth, driven by commercial and residential segments.

news.title: The Phoenix Mills'  profit rises 4% to ₹276 crore in Q3 FY26
news.para: Phoenix Mills  reported a 4 percent increase in its consolidated net profit for the third quarter of the current fiscal year, reaching Rs 275.79 crore. This marks an improvement from the Rs 264.76 crore profit recorded in the same period last year.

news.title: HDFC Capital & Curated Living Solutions establish ₹1,000 crore rental housing platform
news.para: HDFC Capital Advisors and Curated Living Solutions are embarking on a new journey to create a rental housing platform. With a robust budget of ₹1,000 crore, the project will focus on building and managing rental properties designed for students, young professionals, and migrant workers.

news.title: ACC's net profit declines 62.97% in Q3 FY26
news.para: ACC, part of the Adani Group, reported a 62.97% drop in net profit for the quarter that concluded on December 31, 2025. The cement sales soared by 15% compared to the same period last year. The ready-mix concrete division also thrived with a 36% growth in volumes.

news.title: CorporatEdge partners with Braymont Holding for ₹225 crore GCC expansion
news.para: CorporatEdge will invest Rs 225 crore to expand its Global Capacity Centres network. The company has partnered with Braymont Holding for this expansion across the GCC. Their first UAE Offitel in Downtown Dubai offers premium serviced suites and caters to global enterprises. This venture aims to create future-ready workplaces in the UAE, leveraging global expertise and local market knowledge.

news.title: Found three illegal borewells at Lalit hotel, sealed one of them, NDMC tells NGT
news.para: New Delhi Municipal Council informed the National Green Tribunal about sealing one of three illegal borewells at The Lalit hotel. The hotel has applied for permission for the remaining two, with environmental compensation to be assessed. The tribunal is hearing a plea regarding illegal groundwater extraction by hotels.

news.title: Bhopal: NGT forms committee to investigate air & noise pollution complaints from Tulsi Tower's residents
news.para: The National Green Tribunal has formed a joint committee to investigate air and noise pollution complaints from residents of Tulsi Tower in Bhopal. The committee will probe environmental violations by a construction company and the Madhya Pradesh Housing & Infrastructure Development Board. Residents have reported severe pollution and health issues.

news.title: Jaipur development body allots land for new metro line
news.para: Jaipur Development Authority's land committee approved 7,700 sq metres for Jaipur Metro Phase-1C, involving land exchange with the forest department. Additionally, 2,000 sq metres were allocated for a government primary school in Chaksu village, facilitating infrastructure development in the region.
